name: RPG MO - MMORPG
description:
To start simply create your account by entering username and password!

RPG MO is an online multiplayer role-playing game that requires time and dedication. The game is created with adult gamers in mind, but younger players can also enjoy it. Overall it is a simple yet addictive game where you can fight monsters and try out 14 different skills. It is free to play and no downloads are required. It even works in your smartphone and tablet.

Features:

  • Party with up to 4 players
  • Randomly generated dungeons
  • Tutorial
  • Fighting with monsters
  • Player duelling
  • Lots of maps
  • Magic spells, teleportation
  • Making potions - alchemy
  • Cutting different trees - woodcutting
  • Building a house - carpentry
  • Growing and harvesting plants - farming
  • Catching lots of different fish - fishing
  • Preparing fish and other dishes - cooking
  • Making jewelry
  • Making weapons, armors and tools - forging
  • Upgrading items through enchanting
  • Mining different resources
  • Player chat, whispering etc
  • Shops
  • Market to trade with players
  • Chest for storing items
  • Pets
  • Anti-bot system
  • High scores table
  • Minimap
  • Gamepad support
  • Breeding
  • Archery and fletching

Official site http://mo.ee
